sentences.en: And the music of the fluttering birds had an eerie lilt to it.
sentences.cn: 飞鸟的歌声听着也有点瘆人.

sentences.en: And then there are glaciers, which often look an eerie blue.
sentences.cn: 对了,还有冰川, 它们看起来呈怪诞的蓝色.

sentences.en: As I entered the corridor which led to my room that eerie feeling came over me.
sentences.cn: 走进通往我房间的走廊时，那种怪异恐怖的感觉包围了我。

sentences.en: Hazy, dust - filtered sunlight illuminates a landscape of eerie, post - apocalyptic silence.
sentences.cn: 朦胧的阳光透过灰尘,照着一片可怕的风景, 显示“后启示录”的死寂.

sentences.en: He had the eerie feeling that he was being shadowed.
sentences.cn: 他因觉得有人跟踪,而感到害怕.

sentences.en: His trip . is an eerie nightscape full of rubble and reflexive violence ( Time )
sentences.cn: 他神秘的经历充满了坎坷与曲折 ( 时代 )

sentences.en: I walked down the eerie dark path.
sentences.cn: 我走在那条漆黑恐怖的小路上。

sentences.en: It was an eerie feeling, holding them again --- and wonderful too.
sentences.cn: 再次举起他们,感觉难以名状 —— 不过,也非常美好.

sentences.en: It's eerie to walk through a dark wood at night.
sentences.cn: 夜晚在漆黑的森林中行走很是恐怖.

sentences.en: So you're leaving your best friend alone in an eerie chateau on his first night?
sentences.cn: 所以你要在头一晚把你最好的朋友抛在这古怪的山庄里?

sentences.en: That night we heard an eerie sound as we were playing cards.
sentences.cn: 那晚我们玩牌时听到了奇怪的声音.

sentences.en: The clouds cast a shadow and gave everything an eerie light.
sentences.cn: 乌云投下的阴影使万物都罩上了一层可怕的光芒.

sentences.en: the eerie sound of an owl hooting at night
sentences.cn: 夜间猫头鹰那怪异恐怖的叫声

sentences.en: The film has eerie parallels with the drama being played out in real life.
sentences.cn: 这部电影和现实生活中发生的一系列戏剧性事件有着诡异的巧合之处。

sentences.en: This eerie calm is an illusion.
sentences.cn: 这种怪诞的平静是一种假象。

trans.tran_cn: 可怕的，怪异的，怪诞的，胆小的
